text: The year 2016 was the 7th year in the history of the Road Fighting Championship, an MMA promotion based in South Korea. 2016 started with Road FC 028 and ended with Road FC 035. == List of events == {| class="sortable wikitable succession-box" style="margin:1.0em auto; font-size:80%;" !
